documentation.title: Use Declaration
documentation.standard: The use keyword used inside the classes to implement traits MUST be declared on the next line after the opening brace. Each individual trait that is imported into a class MUST be included one-per-line and each inclusion MUST have its own use import statement. When the class has nothing after the use import statement, the class closing brace MUST be on the next line after the use import statement. Otherwise, it MUST have a blank line after the use import statement.

code.title: Invalid: superfluous whitespace and blank lines used.
